bibl.title: Deir el-Naqlun: The Greek Papyri (P. Naqlun I); - (Plates). (Studia antiqua.)
bibl.note: P. Naqlun I, 1-14. Diss. Univ. of Warsaw, 1994. - Bibliography. - Introduction: Deir el-Naqlun and Polish Research 1986-1993. - 1-6. Biblical Papyri.
